sentences.english: Indeed this already seems to be happening.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，投資者似乎已經開始草木皆兵了。

sentences.english: Just before the war, the whole country was panic-stricken.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭即將打響，全國上下草木皆兵。
